summary: Vercel ignore file for deployments. tsconfig.json was removed from ignore list to allow TypeScript path alias resolution during builds (commit d5e1620).
content:
# Dependencies
node_modules
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Testing
coverage
.nyc_output

# Development
.env.local
.env.development.local
.env.test.local
.env.production.local

# Build outputs
.next/
out/
dist/
build/

# Misc
.DS_Store
*.pem

# Debug
.vscode/
.idea/

# Git
.git/
.gitignore

# Documentation
README.md
CONTRIBUTING.md
AGENTS.md

# Config files that shouldn't be deployed
.eslintrc.js
.prettierrc.js
jest.config.js

# Project memory
.project-memory/

# Test files
**/*.test.ts
**/*.test.tsx
**/*.spec.ts
**/*.spec.tsx
__tests__/
notes: tsconfig.json is required during Vercel build (removed from ignore list).
Removal performed in commit d5e1620 on main â€” fixes Turbopack/Next.js path alias resolution.
